transcript:

Executive: Sir aapke product ke regarding jo lead generate ho raha hai right wo almost kya kehte hain 100 to 100 lead generate ho raha hai right sir but aap logon ka jo consumption yaha dikha raha hai mere pass by lead ka that is

Executive: Hmm

Executive: Are wo close kar lena sir main wo mana nahi kar raha meri baat to suniye main kuch batana chah raha hun pehle meri baat samajhne ki koshish kariye
Customer: Abhi rain drop se nahi rain drop close ho gaya samajh lo abhi mere ko capcha play ek hi baat hona chahiye
Executive: Haan to capcha play ke liye hi bol raha hun waha par rain drop wali id me jo by lead aapko waha dikha rahe hain na wo rain drop

Executive: Kyun login kijiye usme mujhe kuch aapko batana hai waha par jo by lead aapko dikh raha hai na us nahi nahi mere ko wo nahi chahiye sir mere ko sir abhi main example bolta hun main kuch aur samjhana chah raha hun pehle meri baat dhyan se suno aap rain drop wala account login karenge waha pe aapko jo bhi by lead dikhega

Executive: Tejas Tejas play equipment Tejas play equipment haan ji
Customer: Hmm okay usme to by lead ja rahe hain na daily
Executive: Ye ye
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi mera colleague ka hai mera colleague mere dusre mera dost ka hai wo
Executive: Okay okay isme dikha rahe hain na by lead se isme show ho rahe hain na Tejas play Tejas play equipment mein jo by lead ka consumption ho raha hai na sir basically right wo
Customer: Haan mere ko nahi ho raha hai na capcha play equipment mein nahi ho rahe hain na
Executive: Suniye to sahi Tejas play equipment mein inke bahut sare products aur bhi hain jisme by lead consumption kar rahe hain carpoline park mein by lead consume kar rahe hain kids play equipment mein by lead consume kar rahe hain aur apna agar main baat kar raha hun to ye by lead dikha raha hai outdoor play playground equipment mein by lead consume kar rahe hain ek soft play equipment mein by lead consume kar rahe hain to ye in in categories mein by lead consume bhi kar rahe hain

Customer: Trampoline park trampoline park hame bhi use karte hain okay trampoline park aap use karte hain indoor playground
Executive: Haan indoor playground bhi use karte hain
Executive: Soft play equipments
Customer: Soft play equipment bhi use kar rahe hain
Executive: Aur jo ye ek aur category bata raha hun ek minute rukiyega amusement park equipments
Customer: Amusement nahi hai ji amusement mein nahi kar rahe aur balance beams
Executive: Hmm balance beams
Customer: Nahi hai ji wo bhi nahi use kar rahe wo bhi nahi use karte na ye in in categories ke bhi by lead consume kar rahe hain isliye inke pass by lead show kar raha hai right main ye to yahi batana chah raha tha aur jo aap indoor play equipment soft play equipment in logo in product ki by lead bol rahe hain na sir inke pass bhi direct inquiries jyada generate ho rahe hain as compare to by lead main yaha open karke
Customer: Ji mere ko inquiry nahi hai na ji
Executive: Haan ji wahi mere ko wo wo specific keyword mein mere ko by lead generate hi nahi ho rahe hain na
Executive: Haan to wo IndiaMART ke pass se hi kam generate ho rahe hain is wajah se aapke pass nahi show karta hai kyunki by lead agar backend se nahi aayega right to aapke pass kaise show karegi
Customer: Haan wo tumhe wo wo ready karke dena hai na mere ko
Executive: To wo ready to tab hoga na jab customer ki backend se by lead aayegi to main definitely aap logon ko share kar paunga
Customer: Are yaar usko dikha rahe hain mere ko nahi dikha rahe hain to kaisa yaar
Executive: Sir usko jo dikha raha hai wo by lead nahi dikha raha wo inquiry dikha raha hai uske portal pe customer directly agar requirement dal raha hai na to wo inquiry hoti hai wo by lead nahi hota hai wo requirement ke through consume kar raha hai wo ye cheez hai
Customer: Are yaar mere ko requirement bhi nahi aa raha hai na yaar
Executive: Sir requirement to buyer ke upar depend karega na ki wo aapko inquiry dalna chahta hai ki nahi dalna chahta hai sir
Customer: Aap samajh nahi rahe main kya kehna chah raha hun main ye kehna chah raha hun aapka manager kon hai mere ko dopahar ek 2 baje 3 baje ko mera manager connect connect karke de dijiye
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads since 3 months.

- Dissatisfied with the services.

- Wants to talk to the manager.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the backend and informed about it.

- Explained about the difference between inquiry and buylead.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will connect with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, rain drop, capcha play, inquiry
